title: SpiceJunkie's BBQ dry rub No.14
directions: Combine brown sugar, paprika, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, chili powder, cilantro, cayenne pepper, cumin, and ginger in a sealable bowl. Place the lid on the bowl and shake until well-blended.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon dried cilantro leaves (such as McCormick)
